notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: X.G., G.H., and J.J. conceived and designed the experiments; X.G. collected the plant material, extracted essential oil, and carried out statistical analysis of all data, and with the help of S.F., analyzed the components using GC-MS. The anti-inflammatory activity assay was carried out by J.W. and the antitumor activity was assayed by L.H. X.Gã€‚ and G.H. conducted the ITS sequence amplification and wrote the manuscript.
